00020 #include "repository.h"

00022 #include "session.h"

00024 namespace RDK2 { namespace RepositoryNS {
00025 
00026 Url Session::getAbsoluteUrl(CUrl url) { return url.contextualize(urlContext); }
00027 string Session::getRepositoryName() const { return repository->getRepositoryName(); }
00028 string Session::getSessionName() const { return sessionName; }
00029 string Session::getDescription() const { return description; }
00030 
00031 void Session::checkStarted() throw (InvalidOperation) {
00032     if (!started) throw InvalidOperation("Session '" + sessionName + "' was not started");
00033 }
00034 
00035 bool Session::haveSameObject(cstr url1, cstr url2) throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00036 {
00037     Property* p1 = lockAndGetProperty(url1);
00038     Property* p2 = lockAndGetProperty(url2);
00039     RDK2::Object* obj1 = p1->getObjectL();
00040     RDK2::Object* obj2 = p2->getObjectL();
00041     bool r = (obj1 && obj2 && obj1 == obj2);
00042     unlockProperty(p2);
00043     unlockProperty(p1);
00044     return r;
00045 }
00046 
00047 Property* Session::lockAndGetProperty(CUrl url, bool followLinks)
00048     throw (InvalidOperation, NoSuchProperty)
00049 {
00050     checkStarted();
00051     Url aurl = getAbsoluteUrl(url);
00052     if (!aurl.isAbsolute() && !aurl.isComplete())
00053         throw InvalidOperation("Url has to be absolute or complete ('" + aurl + "')");
00054 
00055     Property* p = 0;
00056     for (int redirCount = 0; redirCount < (followLinks ? MAX_LINK_LEVELS : 1); redirCount++) {
00057         try {
00058             // throws NoSuchProperty (also if it has been deleted)
00059             p = repository->getProperty(aurl, this);
00060         }
00061         catch (const NoSuchProperty& e) {
00062             throw(e);
00063         }
00064         catch (const SessionException& e) {
00065             throw(e);
00066         }
00067         Profiler::lock((sessionName + ":" + aurl).c_str());
00068 
00069         p->lock(HERE);
00070         if (p->isLink()) {
00071             aurl = p->linkTo;
00072             p->unlock();
00073             Profiler::unlock((sessionName + ":" + aurl + "(followLinks)").c_str());
00074         }
00075         else {
00076             return p;
00077         }
00078     }
00079     if (followLinks) throw InvalidOperation("Too many link levels");
00080     else {
00081         if (p) return p;
00082         else throw InvalidOperation("Something weird has happened! ");
00083     }
00084 }
00085 
00086 void Session::unlockProperty(Property* p)
00087 {
00088     p->unlock();
00089     Profiler::unlock((sessionName + ":" + p->url).c_str());
00090 }
